text:
HOMEPAGE

Mom Is Shocked When She First Sees The Baby’s Face, But She Later Learns Why He Looks The Way He Does

With his abnormally hairy back and the appearance of an 80-year-old, it’s easy to understand why a newborn born on September 25 in Bangladesh is attracting international notice. According to the Daily Mail, the toddler has progeria, a rare illness that affects one in every four million individuals and causes the body to age far quicker than usual.
